title: Where to find out who composes login music?
body: The Kled login music is amazing, and I'd like to know who composed it so maybe I could find more of their stuff. The brass is so satisfying I absolutely love it.

replies.body:
Thanks so much for listening!

I wrote the music for Kled :) Not sure I did anything else in that genre (Noxian hillbilly), though.

Once again, we were lucky to record 19 of the best brass and woodwinds players in Los Angeles - they did such a great job!

Cheers!

Ed the Conqueror
Just post here, if you are lucky a Rioter will notice your question and answer you.
